meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by leukemia.
meanings.sent1: The leucemic patient underwent chemotherapy to treat the disease.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leucemic symptoms.
meanings.sent3: Despite his leucemic condition, the patient kept a positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: The leucemic battle was like fighting an invisible enemy.
meanings.sent5: The pale skin was a leucemic indicator of the illness.

meanings.sent1: Her leucemic appearance made the doctor suspect a serious illness.
meanings.sent2: The leucemic cells were multiplying rapidly in his body.
meanings.sent3: The leucemic cat seemed to have endless energy despite its condition.
meanings.sent4: The leucemic cloud of uncertainty hung over the patient's prognosis.
meanings.sent5: The leucemic traits were evident in the blood test results.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the presence of abnormal white blood cells in the body.
meanings.sent1: The leucemic count in his blood was alarmingly high.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the implications of the leucemic cells in her system.
meanings.sent3: The leucemic invasion in his body was like an unwelcome guest.
meanings.sent4: The leucemic storm of cells wreaked havoc on her immune system.
meanings.sent5: The leucemic presence was detected during a routine check-up.
